TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceEndpointElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceEndpointElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示一个配置元素，该配置元素为用于公开服务的服务终结点的绑定、协定和地址属性提供设置。

span.span: Represents a configuration element that provides settings for binding, contract, and address properties for a service endpoint, which is used to expose services.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri address, string contractType) cil managed
Public Sub New (address As Uri, contractType As String)

param.name: address
param.span: 一个包含终结点地址的 URI。

span.span: A URI that contains the address of the endpoint.
The contract this endpoint is exposing.

summary.span: 使用指定的终结点地址和协定类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified endpoint address and contract type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Address { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Address : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含终结点地址的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets a URI that contains the address of the endpoint.

value.span: 一个包含终结点地址的 URI。

span.span: A URI that contains the address of the endpoint.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将地址指定为绝对地址或相对地址。The address can be specified as an absolute or relative address. 如果提供的是相对地址，则需要主机提供适合于绑定中所使用的传输方案的基址。If a relative address is provided, the host is expected to provide a base address appropriate for the transport scheme used in the binding. 如果未配置地址，则假定基址为该终结点的地址。If an address is not configured, the base address is assumed to be the address for that endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BehaviorConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BehaviorConfiguration : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，其中包含要用于终结点的行为的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the behavior to be used for the endpoint.

value.span: 要用于终结点的行为的名称。

span.span: The name of the behavior to be used for the endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Binding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Binding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定要使用的绑定的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the type of binding to use.
The type of binding to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该类型必须具有一个已注册的配置节，才能加以引用。The type must have a registered configuration section in order to be referenced. 该类型是按节名而不是绑定的类型名注册的。The type is registered by section name, rather than by the type name of the binding.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BindingConfiguration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BindingConfiguration : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含实例化终结点时所使用的绑定的绑定名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains the binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated.

value.span: 要在实例化终结点时使用的绑定的绑定名称。

span.span: The binding name of the binding to use when the endpoint is instantiated.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义终结点时，绑定名称必须在作用域内。The binding name must be in scope when the endpoint is defined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BindingName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BindingName : string with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets a string that defines the qualified name of the binding for definition export through WSDL.

value.span: 绑定的限定名称，用于通过 WSDL 进行的定义导出。

span.span: The qualified name of the binding for definition export through WSDL.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Contract { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Contract : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定终结点公开哪个协定。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies which contract this endpoint is exposing.
The contract this endpoint is exposing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集必须实现该协定类型。The assembly must implement the contract type. 如果服务实现所实现的是单个协定类型，则可以省略此属性。If a service implementation implements a single contract type, then this property can be omitted.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the standard endpoint that is set by the property, which references to the additional configuration information of this standard endpoint.

summary.span: 必须在 中定义相同的名称。

span.span: The same name must be defined in the .

value.span: 由 设置的标准终点的名称。

span.span: The name of the standard endpoint that is set by the property.

summary.span: 此类型必须在 节或 machine.config 中进行注册。如果未指定任何值，则创建常规服务终结点。
